## Notes

-  cf dense_rank TIL, this is an id for a group, gives a *grouped* variable a shared id 
 




## Example

```{r}
cheshire_petitions |> 
  select(petition_id, topic, response) |> 
  group_by(topic) |> 
  #arrange(-nn, .by_group = T) |> # again, this doesn't make any difference to numbering 
  mutate(grp_id = cur_group_id(), n_topic=n()) |> 
  ungroup() |> 
  count(topic, response, grp_id, n_topic)  

```
